title: Community Pizza Day
description: A fun gathering where residents bake and share homemade pizzas using local ingredients.

title: Town Square Refresh
description: Residents collaborate to repaint benches, plant flowers, and brighten the town square.

title: Community Celebration Night
description: A festive evening with music, home-cooked food, and activities celebrating achievements.

title: Neighborhood Beautification Day
description: Residents join forces to decorate public areas, repaint fences, and create a welcoming environment.

title: Local Farmer Appreciation Picnic
description: A community picnic featuring fresh produce from local farmers and activities.
